strings.VSTWITCH_DESCRIPTION_DIALOG_TWITCH_SETUP: Look's like your Twitch authorization has expired or this is your first time using this mod. Your browser will open outside of the game; please ensure you follow the prompts before returning to the game!
strings.VSTWITCH_DESCRIPTION_DIALOG_WALKTHROUGH_: Would you like to walk through the high-level options of the mod and configure them? (About 3 questions)
When you open most chests/equipment, would you like Twitch Chat to vote for 1 of 3 random items? (Chat influences your items; all players receive a copy)
If you are a Twitch affiliate, would you like bit donations to contribute towards a goal and upon reaching it triggers events? (Events are all 'negative' and do not generally help you)
The bits goal is set to {0} bits. You can change this via the in-game "Settings" menu.
If you are a Twitch affiliate, would you like to enable channel points to influence your runs? (These are 'negative' and 'positive' effects)

Rewards can be customized via the Manage Rewards section under Channel Points in the Creator Dashboard. (https://link.twitch.tv/myChannelPoints) IMPORTANT: You need to copy the reward name EXACTLY (case-sensitive) into this mods settings. You can access them via the in-game "Settings" menu.

Rewards can be customized via the Manage Rewards section under Channel Points in the Creator Dashboard. (https://link.twitch.tv/myChannelPoints) Be sure to disable any/all rewards that have been configured for this mod.
